title: Who's the most divisive musician in the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly, me. I love America don’t get it twisted but I have offended so many people in America throughout my career that I no longer see a point in stepping off that path. I’m way past the point of no return. And I’m cool with that. My personal values are different from the majority of my fellow Americans and I’ve long stopped caring about their feelings towards me. When people fail at shutting you down through words, they try to shut you out through social exclusion. That’s what I’m dealing with right now and since I don’t think I will ever be accepted by my fellow Americans, I’m just going to keep doing me, complete my 5 language Duolingo lessons, and make a living as an entertainer overseas.
It’s a tie between Lady Gaga, Cher, Madonna, Barbara Streisand, and Itzhak Perlman. (Outside the U.S., perhaps Daniel Barenboim)
